A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Nope.

Just nope\, there are a lot of things to like about this movie visually\, and is very exploitative on new things to introduce into Star Wars lorre\, that make this a joyful experience\, and a wonderful film\, but it unfortunately falls flat the rest of the film\, and as a Star Wars film.

Rian Johnson of the plot hole filled Looper\, does an amazing job at eliminating plot holes we spent decades asking\, and an additional two years on top of that. Not solving plot holes\, eliminating them. Only to create a handful of his own to not be answered.

I was excited about the possibility of Rian Johnson being at the helm of a Skywalkerless Trilogy\, but he went ahead and created that within the Skywalker Saga already. Needless to say\, I am not looking forward to him at the helm of a new trilogy anymore.
